title: Lubalin Graph
content:
I need information on the typeface Lubalin Graph, created by Herb Lubalin in 1974. I’ve looked many places already but haven’t found much in terms of why it was created.

 [‹ Logout/Cancel registration](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054806/http:/typophile.com/node/18654 "Go to previous forum topic") [Tablet or Mouse ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054806/http:/typophile.com/node/18576 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jdj217

comments.content:
The Herb Lubalin Study Center of Design and Typography
